'''"Return to the flames, return to the path."''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

One copy of "Return to the flames, return to the path." is obtained by reaching [[Tribe Reputation]] Level 4 with 6 tribes in [[Natlan]].

After leaving placement mode, a fire appears in the center. The fire is decorative only and does not apply {{Pyro}}. There are seven seats surrounding the flame.
